name: Monster Crusher: ASMR Bucket
description:
Want to know how it feels to break down a skyscraper or a 20km high monster?
Then this game is for you. You will be given the job of a deconstructor to break down 100 great buildings in a short amount of time. Can you handle the challenge?

GAME FEATURES
- Various Building Models: blue monsters, fedy bear, bunny, etc
- Different themes: Horror, Halloween, Thanksgiving, New year's eve, etc

HOW TO PLAY
- Drag to move the buzz saw
- Use your gas efficiently
- Use strategy to pass level
- Upgrading wisely
The more you earn, the higher level is your equipment and you can dig out walls faster than before

Countless models are waiting to be unlocked. Download Now!!!!!
